1.title: #1 Anchor for the Soul
1.description: We have hope because we believe God's promises and wait patiently for future grace.

2.title: #2 Mind, Heart, and Soul
2.description: Mind, heart, and soul are three tricky biblical concepts, but important nonetheless.

3.title: #3 The Self-Love Delusion
3.description: The Bible is clear: we don't need bother loving ourselves. We must love Christ and others.
